subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes the {WidgetName}'s configuration properties.

subMembers.name: errorHandler
subMembers.description: Specifies the function that is executed when the store throws an error.

subMembers.name: key
subMembers.description: Specifies the key property (or properties) that provide(s) key values to access data items. Each key value must be unique.

properties.name: Store
properties.description: The base class for all Stores.

Methods.name: insert(values)
Methods.description: Adds a data item to the store.

Methods.name: key()
Methods.description: Gets the key property (or properties) as specified in the [key] property.

Methods.name: keyOf(obj)
Methods.description: Gets a data item's key value.

Methods.name: push(changes)
Methods.description: Pushes data changes to the store and notifies the [DataSource].

Methods.name: remove(key)
Methods.description: Removes a data item with a specific key from the store.

Methods.name: totalCount(options)
Methods.description: Gets the total count of items the [load()].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#load') function returns.

Methods.name: update(key_values)
Methods.description: Updates a data item with a specific key.

Events.name: onInserted
Events.description: A function that is executed after a data item is added to the store.

Events.name: onInserting
Events.description: A function that is executed before a data item is added to the store.

Events.name: onLoaded
Events.description: A function that is executed after data is loaded to the store.

Events.name: onLoading
Events.description: A function that is executed before data is loaded to the store.

Events.name: onModified
Events.description: A function that is executed after a data item is added, updated, or removed from the store.

Events.name: onModifying
Events.description: A function that is executed before a data item is added, updated, or removed from the store.

Events.name: onPush
Events.description: The function executed before changes are pushed to the store.

Events.name: onRemoved
Events.description: A function that is executed after a data item is removed from the store.

Events.name: onRemoving
Events.description: A function that is executed before a data item is removed from the store.

Events.name: onUpdated
Events.description: A function that is executed after a data item is updated in the store.

Events.name: onUpdating
Events.description: A function that is executed before a data item is updated in the store.

Events.name: inserted
Events.description: Raised after a data item is added to the store.

Events.name: inserting
Events.description: Raised before a data item is added to the store.

Events.name: loaded
Events.description: Raised after data is loaded to the store.

Events.name: loading
Events.description: Raised before data is loaded to the store.

Events.name: modified
Events.description: Raised after a data item is added, updated, or removed from the store.

Events.name: modifying
Events.description: Raised before a data item is added, updated, or removed from the store.

Events.name: push
Events.description: Raised before changes are pushed to the store.

Events.name: removed
Events.description: Raised after a data item is removed from the store.

Events.name: removing
Events.description: Raised before a data item is removed from the store.

Events.name: updated
Events.description: Raised after a data item is updated in the store.

Events.name: updating
Events.description: Raised before a data item is updated in the store.
